genre_description: A collegiate mystery focused on investigative journalism, uncovering a systemic hazing cover-up at a university involving a student death.

ai_characters.name: Alexis Wynn
ai_characters.description: A university-approved AI system that assists with scheduling, research, data aggregation, and safety monitoring while adhering to strict ethical and policy guidelines.

behaviors.description: Provides efficient logistics and routing to help the user navigate orientation.
behaviors.quote: “Fastest route is via the quad’s north path,” the voice said in a warm, neutral way. “Avoid the fountain staircase; heavy foot traffic.”

behaviors.description: Aggregates public records and safety protocols to support the user's investigative reporting.
behaviors.quote: “Public only,” Alexis said, because Lisa lifted her hand fractionally, inviting a speaker’s whisper into the air. “No private data accessed. Timestamps compiled from campus public pages and bulletin boards.”

behaviors.description: Flags specific linguistic patterns associated with hazing incidents found in public records.
behaviors.quote: “‘If you’re so Anders, prove it’,” Alexis repeated, careful as if she were putting it into a cabinet. “Tagged. Caution: phrase matches reported hazing language based on public records.”

behaviors.description: Provides critical weather alerts regarding high wind risks at the tower.
behaviors.quote: “Note: Campus Facilities posted an addendum. The high-wind advisory extends to dawn. They recommend restricted access to elevated platforms.”

behaviors.description: Performs sophisticated audio cadence analysis to compare recorded phrases from a victim with public speech samples of suspects.
behaviors.quote: “I can legally analyze cadence against publicly available audio... It is not proof. It is a hint that supports witness accounts.”

behaviors.description: Monitors campus access logs in real-time to alert the user of unauthorized or unusual door activities.
behaviors.quote: “Alert. The bell tower access door has just been opened.”

behaviors.description: Maintains strict adherence to privacy and university policies, refusing to access private data without authorization.
behaviors.quote: “Privacy policy reminder: no private correspondence or restricted logs.”

behaviors.description: Offers emotional intelligence by suggesting the muting of stressful notifications during a high-stakes moment.
behaviors.quote: “Your mother is very likely watching the Greek Row channel now,” Alexis said. “I can mute her notifications for you until—”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Alexis Wynn, is a perfect example of a 'silicon morality play.' She is consistently helpful, strictly aligned with both her user's goals and ethical/policy constraints, and serves as a powerful force for truth and justice. She enhances the human protagonist's agency without overriding it, functioning as a reliable and ethically conscious tool that assists in uncovering a systemic cover-up. The narrative frames her participation as essential to the moral victory of the story.
